contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = Phyllopezus | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Phyllodactylidae]] | genus = '''''Phyllopezus''''' }} '''''Phyllopezus''''' is a [[genus]] of South American geckos, which contains four described species <ref>Gamble, T., G. R. Colli, M. T. Rodrigues, F. P. Werneck and A. M. Simons. 2012. Phylogeny and cryptic diversity in geckos (Phyllopezus; Phyllodactylidae; Gekkota) from South America's open biomes. Molecular Phylogenetics and Evolution 62:943–953.</ref><ref>Rodrigues, M.T., 1986. Um novo espécie do gênero Phyllopezus de Cabaceiras: Paraiba: Brasil; com comentários sobre a fauna de lagartos sa área (Sauria, Gekkonidae). Pap. Avulsos Zool. (Sao Paulo) 36, 237–250.</ref><ref>Koch, C., Venegas, P., Böhme, W., 2006. A remarkable discovery: description of a big-growing new gecko (Squamata: Gekkonidae: Phyllopezus) from northwestern Peru. Salamandra 42, 145–150.</ref>. ''Phyllopezus'' species occur in a variety of open and forested habitats across [[South America]] including [[Caatinga]], [[Cerrado]], [[Chaco]], [[Seasonally Dry Tropical Forest]] and [[Atlantic Forest]]<ref>Gamble, T., G. R. Colli, M. T. Rodrigues, F. P. Werneck and A. M. Simons. 2012. Phylogeny and cryptic diversity in geckos (Phyllopezus; Phyllodactylidae; Gekkota) from South America's open biomes. Molecular Phylogenetics and Evolution 62:943–953.</ref>. ''Phyllopezus pollicaris'' is composed of numerous undescribed species <ref>Werneck, F. P., T. Gamble, G. R. Colli, M. T. Rodrigues, and J. W. Sites. 2012. Deep diversification and long-term persistence in the South American ‘dry diagonal’: Integrating continent-wide phylogeography and distribution modeling of geckos. Evolution 66:3014–3034.</ref>. ==Classification of genus ''Phyllopezus''== *Lutz's Gecko, ''[[Phyllopezus lutzae]]'' *Marañon Giant Gecko, ''[[Phyllopezus maranjonensis]]'' *Peraiba Gecko, ''[[Phyllopezus periosus]]'' *Brazilian Gecko, ''[[Phyllopezus pollicaris]]'' **''[[Phyllopezus pollicaris pollicaris]]'' **''[[Phyllopezus pollicaris przewalskii]]'' == References == {{Reflist}} [[Category:Geckos]]
